profiles:
Experience Business Development Consultant Oracle February 2014  – Present (1 year 7 months) Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia The Oracle Direct/Oracle Market Development plays an important role to the organization. The team is responsible for business development and marketing campaign execution to generate qualified pipeline of strategic accounts through persistent hunting of opportunities.  
 
The primary focus of a Business Development Consultant is to generate demand for Oracle solutions. I'm part of the Application Solution Team and is focused to grew Cloud Applications interest and penetration in Malaysia. While cloud solutions are my main focus, on premise and heavy customized solutions to meet customer's unique processes or specific requirements are still part of my responsibility. Together with the Oracle Sales team, we are working hand in hand to penetrate Malaysian market. 
 
The solutions under my scope are: 
1. Enterprise Resource Planning: Financial Solution, Procurement and Sourcing Management, Supply Chain Management, Project Management 
2. Human Capital Management: Global Human Resource Management, Workforce Optimization / Lifecycle, Workforce Rewards, Worker Interaction, Talent Management, Training and Development, Performance and Goal, Recruitment and On-boarding 
3. Customer Experience: Marketing Management, Social Relation Management, Sales Management, Commerce Management and Service Management 
4. Business intelligence and Enterprise Performance Management Solution. 
 
Awards and Achievements: 
Quarter achiever for three consecutive quarters Q1, Q2, Q3 2015 Oracle Financial Year 
Best Business Development Consultant performer for FY 2015 (Applications) Inside Commercial Account and Partner Manager Juniper Networks April 2012  –  January 2014  (1 year 10 months) - Self responsible in doing market research to find new potential customer 
- Responsible in conducting campaign calls to both partners and existing customers (warm calling) as well as introducing Juniper and generating interest to new customer to induce sales lead and opportunity (cold calling) 
- Responding to inbound calls and incoming leads from various sources to qualify business potentials 
- Maintaining good relationship with the “Focus 100” accounts in order to find out new business opportunities. The “Focus 100” accounts are selected every 6 month. 
- Understands addressable Juniper solution to certain market segments (Manufacturing, Oil and Gas, Hospitality and Retail). Utilizes knowledge of the region and install base to exploit commercial opportunities 
- Responsible in developing strategies to identify customer's needs and to meet/exceed the expected goal 
- Responsible in determining sales price and discount level to both partners and distributors  
- Responsible to develop a dedicated group of partners via Juniper Partner Enablement Program 
- Synchronizing the above strategies with the in-country team to make sure there are no resource and project overlapping.  
- Working together with the in-country team to make sure the business consistently grow 
- Working together with the in-country team to organize events for both customers and partners 
 
Achievements: 
- Quarter Achiever for Q4 2012 
- Best Overall Performance for Q4 2012 Inside Sales Executive Datacom May 2010  –  March 2012  (1 year 11 months) Selangor, Malaysia - To conduct cold calling calls in daily basis 
- Addressing the calls to C level people or decision makers to create product awareness that can generate sales lead 
- To develop and execute individual Sales Plan and Strategy to meet its targets 
- To promote, market and sale IT related products/services through outbound telemarketing calls using consultive selling techniques. 
- To achieve sales target in required timeline. 
- Product Scope: SAP (ERP, Business All-in-One, Business One and Business Object Reporting Solution), Juniper (Switches), Microsoft Business Productivity Online Standard Suite (BPOS), Microsoft Office 2010, Microsoft Exchange Server and Exchange Online) 
- Countries served: Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Singapore, Australia, Philippines & Vietnam 
 
Achievements: 
- Best Sales and Marketing Agent Q4 2010 
- Special Award for voluntary CSR involvement Inside Sales Account Manager Intel Corporation October 2009  –  May 2010  (8 months) Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia - To build strong working relationships with business partners, i.e. identify business opportunities and challenges and to grow their business further. 
- Responsible for meeting productivity targets on a weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual basis. 
- Responsible for meeting revenue goals on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis and to be proactively contacting existing resellers to maintain the client's relationships. 
- Accountable for resolving partner issues, proposing solutions and escalating challenges to reach the required resolution. 
- To provide reports and analysis on respective market as and when required. 
- To develop and maintain positive relationship with field channel sales, support and other counterparts in general. ISO Management Representative (Junior) CMRS Sdn Bhd December 2007  –  September 2009  (1 year 10 months) Selangor, Malaysia - To prepare company’s Quality Manual 
- To represent the company for ISO matters with certification agent (SIRIM) 
- To promote quality awareness in the company 
- To monitor internal preparation progress for ISO certification 
- Responsible in conducting internal audit for ISO certification Department Secretary PT. Ericsson Indonesia November 2005  –  September 2007  (1 year 11 months) Greater Jakarta Area, Indonesia - To prepare and maintain database of department’s documentations and records including consolidating expenses from projects as prepared by Project Secretary/Admin, travel documentations, re-imbursements, assignment administrations and status, periodic reports, and in-out correspondence. 
- To prepare and check required project’s PR, PO, Variations and Invoice Status. 
- Assisting Head of Department by preparing the project documentation status by compiling data and ensure the validity of the data to ease traceability. 
- To act as public relations officer for the Department for promoting effective communication within the organization. Marketing Executive PT. Jakarta Indo Gemilang (a subsidiary company of ESMOD Jakarta) May 2004  –  September 2005  (1 year 5 months) - To market company’s products and services. 
- To prepare quotations to clients. 
- To prepare sales reports to the reporting manager. 
- To maintain good relationship with clients. MarketStar is a part of the Diversified Agency Services (DAS) division of Omnicom Group Inc. (NYSE: OMC). Omnicom is a leading global advertising, marketing and corporate communications company. Omnicom’s branded networks and numerous specialty firms provide advertising, strategic media planning and buying, interactive, direct and promotional marketing, public relations and other specialty communications services to over 5,000 clients in more than 100 countries. Summary My name is Jason Holtom, and I am a member of Enterprise Solutions at Intel.  
 
I am on hand to share information on Intel technologies for Enterprises with in all industry sectors. This covers Intel platforms in the traditional focus areas of IT such as Data Center, PC Clients, plus the adoption ultramobile devices in the workplace. 
 
....You are probably thinking: "Why should I speak with Intel, if I am already receiving the latest product updates from my current technology providers?" 
 
In addition to sharing practical product information on devices already using Intel Chips ... I am also on hand to share and openly discuss information on technology directions as a whole. Sharing how businesses can get the most out of Intel technology...  
 
- This could be understanding how to squeeze the most out of technologies you already have for better ROI and TCO. 
 
- Getting to grips with the latest IT technology trends, be it Big Data, Workplace Transformation, or what Intel is doing in Internet of Things. 
 
- Understanding how your business could differentiate itself with technology and be used to deliver more unique, innovative, and memorable end customer experiences.  
 
- Sharing with you information not publicly available, such as technology road-maps to help you make the best informed purchasing decisions. Summary My name is Jason Holtom, and I am a member of Enterprise Solutions at Intel.

Summary Zubair is a Future Leader who has a wide-range of professional experience. He has graduated from University of Karachi majoring Science in 2004 followed by Northumbria University UK majoring in Electronics Technology 2007 with Good Result. 
 
Zubair started his career in Malaysia in 2008 at Intel APAC Sales Center Malaysia as ISAM, and he has been spending years working for Intel APAC Sales Center for sales transaction and Business Process. 
 
In 2012 Zubair Joined Juniper Networks/MarketStar during his working period, Zubair exposes himself in various assignments and projects that require different skills set, both technical and soft-skills. 
 
In new work path in February 2014, Zubair Joined Microsoft/Sellbytel Malaysia As Life Cycle Management Specialist 
 
Along his journey almost 8 Years In Professional Working Experiences, Zubair has finally found his true passion in B2B Sales and Business Development and has been succeeding in building his core competencies in these areas since then. His core competencies ranging from Customer Support, Business Process, Marketing Insights, Customer Portfolio, Public Speaking And Employee Training.  
 
He is also capable of translating the insights from customers and market into high-level actionable strategy for sales, product development, Project Management and service level in order to support the acceleration of company's growth. 
 
Actually Zubair is a Confident, Creative, Hardworking, and very Focused person. Easily adaptable and Highly Organized which often results better outcomes. I'm also Talkative and often Motivate my surroundings for the better.

- Sales B2B & B2C 
- Cloud Services 
- Business Development 
- Institutional & Corporate sales 
- IT Hardware & Software Industry 
- Business Process & Analysis 
- Customer IT Solution & Application Support 
- Project & Team Management 
- Public Speaking and Employee Training
